climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: FOR EVEN THE MOST SENSITIVE SKIN: We’ve designed our laundry pods to be gentle enough for even the most sensitive skin; Our zero-waste, hypoallergenic laundry detergent contains only natural, plant-based ingredients with magic cleaning power

GOOD FOR YOU, GOOD FOR THE ENVIRONMENT: Our eco friendly detergent pods are completely plastic free and powered by natural, plant based ingredients; That means no phosphates, parabens, phthalates, chlorine bleach, artificial dyes, petroleum, ammonia!

GENTLE & INCREDIBLY EFFECTIVE: These laundry Detergent pods are scientifically formulated with clean ingredients to powerfully lift stains and leave you with fresh clothing – often even more effectively than synthetic, chemical-filled liquid detergents

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these they dissolve easily and you just throw them in the washer. They smell so nice, and better for the environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I strongly prefer buying natural products over ones that are full of chemicals, so that was my first reason for choosing this. I’m also not a fan of clunky detergent bottles and our house has limited space, so I was drawn to it for its size and packaging, as well. I’ve been using this for a few months now and my experiences have been positive. Everything gets clean and smells pleasant. I usually just use one pod per load, unless it’s a very large load.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved these natural laundry pods
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit skeptical order the pods as I wasn’t sure how they would compare to other detergents. These pods work amazingly well and leave laundry both clean and smelling great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell
reviews.reviewText: First time using product and I like it. The smell is so amazing, just wish it would last longer. After the clothing cooled down from dryer, the smell was gone. But overall, it works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No plastic, no waste
reviews.reviewText: clothes come out clean and fresh smelling, I use it with the laundry booster :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CLEANS AND SMELLS GREAT!
reviews.reviewText: Love that it is a clean non toxic product. Cleans very well and smells great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fresh Scent has Baby powder smell. Only washes out well on 3/4 size loads. No way to customize
reviews.reviewText: These do clean nicely, but they are very very concentrated detergent. I have a huge capacity new front loader GE washer, which washes and rinses clothes perfectly, and to try this detergent I only filled it up to the 2/3’s capacity so the clothes can really move around well for cleaning, and also rinse soap out clean. I used just ONE of these pods and it left a pasty residue on the clothes even though the clothes were not overly packed into the drum. And it was a medium sized load. I had to wash the whole load again twice with no soap to get the soap out. So, if you are NOT washing a FULL size load, these have too much soap in a pod. Later I tried doing a little larger than 3/4 size load and it seemed to be the perfect amount of soap.It’s a drawback that you can’t customize the amount of soap for a smaller load because they are only in one size. I wish they offered half load sized pods.Also, I bought the Fresh scent and it smells almost exactly like baby powder. It’s similar to Dreft baby detergent. If you like that smell, then you will love the Fresh scent, and the scent holds on well even after drying and storing fabrics.Despite the limitations and baby powder smell, really like the zero plastic packaging, and I think it does clean the clothes very well if you have an almost full load. So, I’m going to order the Lavender and Spring scent and try those, but I won’t use these to wash smaller loads since it’s too concentrated. And hopefully they offer this in other sizes for smaller loads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First time buying these... absolutely love them. I will continue to purchase! We are a family of 5, soon to be 6, with 2 dogs; this product cleans my clothes and gives them the greatest scent!
